channel.title: NovaScape ~ Flawless Economy || Unique Features || Active Staff || Fair Exp Rate
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://novascape.org/images/logo.png[/img] [SIZE=4][FONT=tahoma][COLOR=#ffffff] [IMG]https://help.wildapricot.com/images/icons/home_16.gif[/img] [/COLOR][FONT=verdana][URL=http://"http://www.novascape.org"][COLOR=#ffffff]Landing Page[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#ffffff] [IMG]http://cdn2.iconfinder.com/data/icons/splashyIcons/download.png[/img] [/COLOR][URL=http://"http://www.novascape.org/Client.jar"][COLOR=#ffffff]Download[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#ffffff] [IMG]http://rs.vksoft.eu/oldschool/images/icons/stat.gif[/img] [/COLOR][URL=http://"http://www.novascape.org/play.html"][COLOR=#ffffff]Play Now[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#ffffff] [IMG]https://assets.evolvehq.com/img/icons/forum.png[/img] [/COLOR][URL=http://"http://www.novascape.org/forums/"][COLOR=#ffffff]Forums[/COLOR][/URL][/FONT][/FONT][/SIZE][SIZE=1][B] [SIZE=4] [/SIZE][/B][/SIZE][IMG]http://oi59.tinypic.com/2ytp7b7.jpg[/img][SIZE=1][B][SIZE=4] [SIZE=5][COLOR=#daa520]Introduction[/COLOR][/SIZE][/SIZE][COLOR=#ffff33] [/COLOR][FONT=century gothic] [SIZE=2]Welcome! Now, that you have taken a chance to view this thread, we ask that you take a moment and give us some feedback.
How long ago was it when the last REAL rsps was online? It's hard to come about private servers with fate and knowing you will have a great time. Well.... STOP! You found that server, everything you can ask for we will do our best to grant! We offer an amazing Community, and some of the best, content seen on a 317!
[COLOR=#00ff00]DOUBLE EXP IS ACTIVE![/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[/B][/SIZE] [COLOR=#ff0000][I][B][SIZE=4]FEATURED CONTENT[/SIZE][/B][/I][/COLOR]
- Duo Slayer - Partner up and earn reward while doing slayer together! - Loyal Titles - Purchase a title with GP, Rep, PKP, or more! - Curses / Normal Prayers - Best for Pking (We do have working Fkeys!) - Completionest Cape - After getting all 99's get the max cape. - Ring of Wealth - Very unique addition - Typing Bot - Earn Reputation & GP for being the fastest typer. - Full Tzhaar Cave - Including all waves to fight Jad. - Pets - Hell Cat, Baby Kittys, and more! (Feeding Coming Soon!) - 24 Skills - Including Dungeoneering, Summoning, Hunter, and soon to be Construction! - Reputation Skill - VERY UNIQUE - Earn Reputation to unlock content like MultiDwarf Cannon & New Areas! - Crystal Key Chest - Earn Rewards from opening the chest. - Bonus Shops - Featuring Mage Bank, Dungeoneering, Bossing, Voting, Donator Shops - Unused Items - We found unused unique items that we managed to put into our server.
[COLOR=#ff0000][I][B][SIZE=4]FEATURED MINIGAMES[/SIZE][/B][/I][/COLOR]
- Dominion Tower - Pest Control - Barrows - Fun PK - Mage Bank - Fight Caves - Fight Pits - Duel Arena (Staking) - Castle Wars
[COLOR=#ff0000][I][B][SIZE=4]FEATURED BOSSES[/SIZE][/B][/I][/COLOR]
- King Black Dragon - GodWars - Kalphite Queen - Avatar of Distruction - Barrelchest - Dagannoth Kings - Tormented Demons - Chaos Elemental - Corporeal Beast
[SIZE=1][B][COLOR=#daa520]
[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE][B][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ff0000][I]LOG-IN & PLAY[/I][/COLOR][COLOR=#daa520] [/COLOR][/SIZE][/B](No Registration Required!)[B][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffff33] [/COLOR][/SIZE][/B][spoiler=View Log-in Screen] [IMG]http://www.novascape.org/images/loader.png[/img][B][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffff33] [/COLOR][/SIZE][/B][IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/3499080f61b7bc379d54209b61621ca1.png[/img][B][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffff33] [/COLOR][/SIZE][/B][/spoiler]
[B][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ff0000][I]SERVER MEDIA[/I][/COLOR][COLOR=#daa520]
[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B][spoiler=View More Pictures] [IMG]http://novascape.org/images/news_thread/Server_Ads/1.png[/img] [IMG]http://novascape.org/images/news_thread/Server_Ads/2.png[/img] [IMG]http://novascape.org/images/news_thread/Server_Ads/4.png[/img] [IMG]http://novascape.org/images/news_thread/Server_Ads/5.png[/img] [IMG]http://novascape.org/images/news_thread/Server_Ads/6.png[/img] [IMG]http://novascape.org/images/news_thread/Server_Ads/7.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[video=youtube;rWUMCq45P-I]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rWUMCq45P-I&t=19[/video]
[IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/ba61b896010d33c46253ace522f9eefe.png[/img]
[COLOR=#00ff00][SIZE=5]Thanks for Viewing[/SIZE][/COLOR] [URL=http://"http://novascape.org"][IMG]http://oi59.tinypic.com/2ytp7b7.jpg[/img][/URL][COLOR=#00ff00][SIZE=5] [/SIZE][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#ffa500][SIZE=5][FONT=century gothic]NovaScape :: Credits[/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][COLOR=#00ff00][SIZE=5] [/SIZE][/COLOR] [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/a+-+j/"][COLOR=red]A -- J[/COLOR][/URL] Simplicity v2 Source + Client + Cache
Rune-Server Community (Providing many dupe fixes, client problems, and alot of other small issues I wouldn't have thought to fix.
[I]ALL Dupes are patched! - Including the hidden dupes that one of the last owners left to spawn items! :D Nice Try with the bank one guys that was good.. [/I][/CENTER]

item.title: NovaScape ~ Flawless Economy || Unique Features || Active Staff || Fair Exp Rate
item.dc:creator: @killerkody killerkody
item.description:
@killerkody wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:15, topic:549866”]Server looks decent, and seems to have potential.
Gave it a try and i must commit i quite enjoy playing Novascape.
The general game play is the same as on most other servers, yet it seems to be more balanced then i seen before.

Little feedback while playing:

-Client doesn’t save your settings. (Brightness, names on/off etc)
-The starter kits aren’t fitting their purposes. (I choose Skiller and still got Combat related items such as weapons)
-Haven’t been able to change my appearance anywhere. (Might have overlooked the make-over-mage)

Other then that i hope this server becomes populated, and i’ll be looking forward to updates and other client sizes.[/quote]

Thank you very much for your feedback!

-Client saving will be introduced soon.
-Starter kits are off balance for what I posted as pictures I do apologize for that, I didn’t just want to though random items and cause problems with the economy later on down the road.
-Make-over-mage is south of the main home teleport.

Read full topic
item.source: NovaScape ~ Flawless Economy || Unique Features || Active Staff || Fair Exp Rate

item.title: NovaScape ~ Flawless Economy || Unique Features || Active Staff || Fair Exp Rate
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Server looks decent, and seems to have potential.
Gave it a try and i must commit i quite enjoy playing Novascape.
The general game play is the same as on most other servers, yet it seems to be more balanced then i seen before.

Little feedback while playing:

-Client doesn’t save your settings. (Brightness, names on/off etc)
-The starter kits aren’t fitting their purposes. (I choose Skiller and still got Combat related items such as weapons)
-Haven’t been able to change my appearance anywhere. (Might have overlooked the make-over-mage)

Other then that i hope this server becomes populated, and i’ll be looking forward to updates and other client sizes.

Read full topic

item.title: NovaScape ~ Flawless Economy || Unique Features || Active Staff || Fair Exp Rate
item.dc:creator: @killerkody killerkody
item.description:
@killerkody wrote:

[CENTER]
[SIZE=4][FONT=tahoma][COLOR=#ffffff] [/COLOR][FONT=verdana][URL=http://“http://www.novascape.org”][COLOR=#ffffff]Landing Page[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#ffffff] [/COLOR][URL=http://“http://www.novascape.org/Client.jar”][COLOR=#ffffff]Download[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#ffffff] [/COLOR][URL=http://“http://www.novascape.org/play.html”][COLOR=#ffffff]Play Now[/COLOR][/URL][COLOR=#ffffff] [/COLOR][URL=http://“http://www.novascape.org/forums/”][COLOR=#ffffff]Forums[/COLOR][/URL][/FONT][/FONT][/SIZE][SIZE=1][B]
[SIZE=4]
[/SIZE][/B][/SIZE][SIZE=1][B][SIZE=4]
[SIZE=5][COLOR=#daa520]Introduction[/COLOR][/SIZE][/SIZE][COLOR=#ffff33]
[/COLOR][FONT=century gothic]
[SIZE=2]Welcome!
Now, that you have taken a chance to view this thread, we ask that you take a moment and give us some feedback.

How long ago was it when the last REAL rsps was online? It’s hard to come about private servers with fate and knowing you will have a great time.
Well… STOP! You found that server, everything you can ask for we will do our best to grant! We offer an amazing Community, and some of the best,
content seen on a 317!

[COLOR=#00ff00]DOUBLE EXP IS ACTIVE![/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

[/B][/SIZE]
[COLOR=#ff0000][I][B][SIZE=4]FEATURED CONTENT[/SIZE][/B][/I][/COLOR]

  • Duo Slayer - Partner up and earn reward while doing slayer together!
  • Loyal Titles - Purchase a title with GP, Rep, PKP, or more!
  • Curses / Normal Prayers - Best for Pking (We do have working Fkeys!)
  • Completionest Cape - After getting all 99’s get the max cape.
  • Ring of Wealth - Very unique addition
  • Typing Bot - Earn Reputation & GP for being the fastest typer.
  • Full Tzhaar Cave - Including all waves to fight Jad.
  • Pets - Hell Cat, Baby Kittys, and more! (Feeding Coming Soon!)
  • 24 Skills - Including Dungeoneering, Summoning, Hunter, and soon to be Construction!
  • Reputation Skill - VERY UNIQUE - Earn Reputation to unlock content like MultiDwarf Cannon & New Areas!
  • Crystal Key Chest - Earn Rewards from opening the chest.
  • Bonus Shops - Featuring Mage Bank, Dungeoneering, Bossing, Voting, Donator Shops
  • Unused Items - We found unused unique items that we managed to put into our server.

[COLOR=#ff0000][I][B][SIZE=4]FEATURED MINIGAMES[/SIZE][/B][/I][/COLOR]

  • Dominion Tower
  • Pest Control
  • Barrows
  • Fun PK
  • Mage Bank
  • Fight Caves
  • Fight Pits
  • Duel Arena (Staking)
  • Castle Wars

[COLOR=#ff0000][I][B][SIZE=4]FEATURED BOSSES[/SIZE][/B][/I][/COLOR]

  • King Black Dragon
  • GodWars
  • Kalphite Queen
  • Avatar of Distruction
  • Barrelchest
  • Dagannoth Kings
  • Tormented Demons
  • Chaos Elemental
  • Corporeal Beast

[SIZE=1][B][COLOR=#daa520]

[/COLOR][/B][/SIZE][B][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ff0000][I]LOG-IN & PLAY[/I][/COLOR][COLOR=#daa520]
[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B](No Registration Required!)[B][SIZE=4][COLOR=#ffff33]

[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B][spoiler=View More Pictures]






[/spoiler]
